dublin_core.dcvalue: Hospitals should keep three considerations in mind when developing a mobile app or tool Focus on a tool that can help patients determine whether a physician visit is needed Have finance professionals play a supporting rather than a leading role in the development of in house mobile health apps Keep it simple for instance by limiting the number of steps patients have to go through to use a mobile app or tool
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-06T16:22:24Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2012-06-27
Healthcare financial management : journal of the Healthcare Financial Management Association
The value of mobile apps in health care.
